TopicTitle: How do I make engine plumes for a part mod? Im trying to make a mod that adds back the LTV-30 engine back from ksp1

Articles.Content: Does anyone have any guidance on how to do this? Uve never used unity before at all.
I have never used Unity before and I do not know how to program, make textures, or any of that for that matter. Can someone provide assistance for this?
Overlapping threads have been merged, and good luck with your question.
Hi, you should hop on the KSP2 Modding Society discord there will be many people there willing to help you get started with your mods.
